questions.question: I would like to know what some details this person

Pratik Dhakal is a proactive and ambitious individual with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Information Technology expected in 2024 from Tribhuvan University. He has hands-on experience as a Data Analyst intern at Meriskill, where he demonstrated proficiency in Python, SQL, data visualization, ETL processes, and machine learning. Pratik has developed projects such as a Sales Dashboard using Power BI and a Diabetes Prediction System using Django and logistic regression. He also worked on a healthcare solution called Medcare, implementing supervised learning algorithms for disease prediction and drug recommendation. With a keen interest in data analysis and machine learning, Pratik is eager to apply his skills and contribute positively to challenging projects.
